description.zh-CN: 瑞士国际字体风格设计，强调网格系统、Helvetica 字体、极简主义和数学精确的排版。包含导航、英雄区、网格展示、字体演示、画廊和数据表格。
description.en-US: Swiss International Typographic Style design emphasizing grid systems, Helvetica typography, minimalism, and mathematical precision. Features navigation, hero section, grid showcase, typography demo, gallery, and data tables.
